sentences.en: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.cn: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.en: A miracle is something that seems impossible but happens anyway.
sentences.cn: 奇迹就是看似不可能，却发生了。

sentences.en: Anything unattempted remains impossible.
sentences.cn: 不去尝试，就什么也不可能。

sentences.en: He thinks the tax is impossible to administer.
sentences.cn: 他认为税金没法管理。

sentences.en: He was faced with a seemingly impossible task.
sentences.cn: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.en: He was facing impossible odds.
sentences.cn: 他面临的情况极为不利。

sentences.en: Helen’s refusal to cooperate put me in an impossible position.
sentences.cn: 海伦拒绝合作，使我进退维谷。

sentences.en: Her death will be an impossible burden on Paul.
sentences.cn: 她的去世将给保罗带来难以承受的打击。

sentences.en: I just want to be able to buy healthy food at a reasonable price. Is that asking the impossible?
sentences.cn: 我只是希望能以合理的价格买到健康食品。难道这是在要求不可能的事吗？

sentences.en: It is difficult to find work these days, but for blind people it is virtually impossible.
sentences.cn: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.en: It is impossible to be sure about the value of land.
sentences.cn: 土地的价值是无法确定的。

sentences.en: It is impossible to get help, so she is doing everything herself.
sentences.cn: 无法获得帮助，所有的活儿只好她自己干。

sentences.en: It is impossible to say who struck the fatal blow.
sentences.cn: 很难判断是谁给了致命的一击。

sentences.en: It was a question that Roy not unnaturally found impossible to answer.
sentences.cn: 那是个罗伊显然无法回答的问题。

sentences.en: It was already impossible to tell where the bullet had entered.
sentences.cn: 已经无法判断子弹是从哪里打进来的。

sentences.en: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.cn: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.en: It's impossible to assess how many officers are participating in the slowdown.
sentences.cn: 要估算出究竟多少高级职员参与了怠工是不可能的。

sentences.en: It's impossible to get everybody together at the same time.
sentences.cn: 让所有人同时聚在一起是不可能的。

sentences.en: It’s impossible to be accurate about these things.
sentences.cn: 这些事情不可能准确无误。

sentences.en: Members with young children often found it impossible to attend evening meetings.
sentences.cn: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.en: She found it impossible to eat lightly.
sentences.cn: 她发现要吃得少简直不可能。

sentences.en: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.cn: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.en: Sometimes, that standard is quite difficult, if not impossible, to achieve.
sentences.cn: 有时即便有可能达到那个标准，那也是非常困难。

sentences.en: Such measures would be highly impracticable and almost impossible to apply.
sentences.cn: 这样的措施非常不切实际，几乎不可能付诸实施。

sentences.en: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.
sentences.cn: 即使有可能，要改变这样的心态也是很难的。

sentences.en: The noise made sleep impossible.
sentences.cn: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.en: The woman is impossible, thought Francesca.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西丝卡暗自思忖，这个女人真让人受不了。

sentences.en: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.--Paulo Coelho
sentences.cn: 世界上只有一样东西可以阻止梦想实现，那就是害怕失败。

words.tran_cn: 不可能地；难以置信地；无法可想地

phrases.tran_cn: 不可能实现的梦；不可能的梦想
没有不可能；一切皆有可能
不可能的任务，棘手的任务

trans.tran_cn: 不可能的，极难应付的，难以忍受的
trans.tran_en: something that is impossible cannot happen or be done
